001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
005
006/**
007 * Detects the application protocol for a flow based on early payload and port hints.
008 *
009 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
010 */
011public interface ProtocolDetector {
012  /**
013   * Classifies a flow using orientation hints and the captured byte preface.
014   *
015   * @param flow five-tuple describing the connection
016   * @param serverPortHint candidate server port derived from connection orientation
017   * @param prefacePeek up to a protocol-specific number of bytes from the start of the stream
018   * @return detected protocol id, or {@link ProtocolId#UNKNOWN} when inconclusive
019   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
020   */
021  ProtocolId classify(FiveTuple flow, int serverPortHint, byte[] prefacePeek);
022}
